title: A New England Nun - "that she had heard aright"

content.question: In paragraph 2, "that she had heard aright" refers to Louisa's belief that

choices.label: Joe has an intimate relationship with Lily
Joe has spoken rudely to Lily
she has perhaps spoken too candidly
she has certainly misconstrued Joe's remarks

content.answer: Joe has an intimate relationship with Lily

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
